name: The Tome of Ascension
description:
Story

You're a hero looking for an old magic book, deep in a dungeon. You are unaware of the dangers lurking down there.

How to play

The crosshair turns green, if you look at objects of interest, and it turns red, if you facing an enemy. Every special ability you use, consumes mana. You can increase your total mana or life pool by finding better gear. 

Controls

Movement: WASD
Sprint: Shift
Jump: Space bar
Attack / Cast: Left Mouse
Crouch: C
Interact: E
Inventory: I or Tab
Character: P
Equip Item: E or Right Mouse
Drop Item: G
Quick Heal: H
Quick Mana: M 
Menu / Close: Escape

The inventory

You come across several items, like weapons, armor or potions etc. during the game. These items can be used to improve your character.

Game in development

This game started as a school project and is currently in an early access state. The game is limited, but still completable. 
In this early access version, only the Spell Caster options are available. Melee and ranged combat options and weapons are unavailable for the time being. They will be added later.
Likewise, you may find interactable loot boxes, which doesn’t have anything inside. I am working on an “auto generate loot system”, which will be implanted at some point.
Bugs and grammar mistakes are unavoidable as well. Please let me know if you notice anything unusual.
Great feedback or suggestions are of course very much appreciated. 

For the time being, the game is only available for Windows
